item.title: HowTo set up the Android SDK on Ubuntu for HTC Phones
item.description: In this post I will explain how I set up the Android SDKon Ubuntu for my HTC Desire. I first followed the steps for Ubuntu as described in Setting up a Device for Development: With an Android-powered device, you can develop and debug your Android applications just as you would on the emulator. Before you can start, there are just a few things to do: Declare your application as “debuggable” in your Android Manifest.

item.title: JavaFX Links of the Week 1, February 2010
item.description: Today I decided to post regularly interesting JavaFX links of the past week. Thanks to Jonathan Gilesfor his great posts on “Java Desktop Links of the Week”. The JavaFX links are just taken from Jonathan’s posts in order to build a little JavaFX news archieve on my own blog and to inform my subscribers on interesting JavaFX news. Here are the JavaFX Links of the Week 1, February 2010: Jim Weaver sums up the Oracle news this week nice and succinctly: ‘We will invest heavily in JavaFX‘.
